entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
